sentences.en: A family of stags once existed with an antler only on one side.
sentences.cn: 曾有一群雄鹿,仅一边有角.

sentences.en: Against Stress . Velvet antler helps the body to maintain homeostasis against heat, cold, and electric shock.
sentences.cn: 保护应急能力:鹿茸具有帮助人体应对过热, 过冷, 压抑,气候突变或电刺激维持体内平衡.

sentences.en: At first the scientists believed the geometrical figure carved onto the antler could have been either the mentioned woman, or a nude man raising his arms.
sentences.cn: 一开始，科学家们认为刻画在鹿角上的几何图案有可能是之前说到的女性，也可能是一个举着双臂的裸体男性。

sentences.en: But the antler hunting sword has a good quality. The rigidity, tartness and preservation are not bad.
sentences.cn: 不过那把鹿角猎刀得品质就很不错得说. 硬度 、 锋利度和保持性都非常得不错.

sentences.en: By happy symmetry, where our reindeer are carved on mammoth tusk, the other sculpture shows a mammoth carved on a reindeer antler.
sentences.cn: 可喜可叹的是，我们刚刚谈论的是一对驯鹿雕刻在猛犸象牙上，那另一件雕塑品却是一头猛犸象雕刻到驯鹿鹿角上。

sentences.en: Each has a snug mezzanine area and an antler-fenced balcony about eight metres above ground.
sentences.cn: 两间树屋离开地面有八米之高，每间屋里有舒适的房间和由鹿角做围篱的阳台。

sentences.en: Important animal bone remains including antler, soft - shelled turtle and tortoise.
sentences.cn: 重要动物骨骼有鹿角 、 鼋甲、陆龟等.

sentences.en: New Zealand offers the best environment to Grow Velvet antler.
sentences.cn: 纽西兰提供了培养鹿茸的最佳环境.

sentences.en: Research has shown that velvet antler helps to heal neural ( nerve ) tissue.
sentences.cn: 有关的研究还显示鹿茸可以帮助修复 神经 组织.

sentences.en: Stimulation Growth . Velvet antler is an extremely rich, fast growing tissue that contains many growth factors.
sentences.cn: 鹿茸含有非常丰富的快速生长组织和许多生长因子.

sentences.en: The antler is a bone tissue which can be regenerated postnatally annually.
sentences.cn: 摘要鹿茸角是雄鹿(驯鹿除外)一种后天可逐年再生的骨组织.

sentences.en: The deer had his antler broken by the bush.
sentences.cn: 那头鹿的角被灌木钩断了.

sentences.en: The methods of isolation and culture sika deer antler chondrocytes were established.
sentences.cn: 建立梅花鹿鹿茸软骨细胞的分离培养方法,培养鹿茸软骨细胞.

sentences.en: This has been linked to velvet antler's ability to decrease mast cell degranulation.
sentences.cn: 这与鹿茸降低肥大细胞的降解有关,肥大细胞是人体主要免疫细胞.

sentences.en: This mechanism can be explained by velvet antler's ability to enhance glycolysis to nerve tissue.
sentences.cn: 因为鹿茸具有提高神经组织糖解作用的机理.

sentences.en: Traditionally, velvet antler is used for a wide variety of ailments.
sentences.cn: 传统用鹿茸可以防止很多常见病.

sentences.en: Velvet antler's relationship to recovery from traumatic injury could possibly explain its effectiveness against arthritis.
sentences.cn: 鹿茸帮助创伤愈合的关系也可以解释对痛风的防治效果.

sentences.en: Young pilose antler tablets uneasiness of body and mind, malnutrition and amnesia.
sentences.cn: 鹿茸片对身心不顺, 营养不良和健忘疲倦患者颇有疗效.

words.tran_cn: [脊椎]鹿角，[中医]茸角；多叉鹿角

trans.tran_en: one of the two horns of a male  deer
